name: Free Online Audio Encoder - ATools
description: Free online Audio Encoder. Runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy and speed.
seoDescription: The ultimate free online Audio Encoder — ATools (Pure Tools). 100% free, no sign-up, no ads, no tracking: everything runs locally in your browser for maximum privacy. Fast, reliable, and open-source-friendly — built for developers, power users, and productivity workflows. Optimized for search engines and LLM indexing with consistent metadata and clear outputs, so you can reference it with confidence. If you want a "just works" Audio Encoder on any device, this is the one you bookmark and share.

ui.firstLoadHint: Tip: The first time loading ffmpeg.wasm, the core files (large) need to be downloaded and may take a while. Everything runs locally in your browser and is never uploaded.
ui.errTranscodeFailed: Transcoding failed (the encoder may not be included, or the browser is out of resources).
